review: Came for consultation for my tooth problem. * ***** *** ****** ********* *** **** **** ** i decided to get the treatment done by him. He marketing ability was good. I found that he is better dentist in the area/locality and was very particular of time. I recommend him ** * **** *******.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited the doctor for a mild tooth pain. He was candid to share this just needs a filling as more often now every cavity is treated as RCT by most dentist. He explains the issue well, suggests the treatment options and also helps choose the best option for the patient. 
Would definitely recommend him for all dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Pahwa is a very friendly and efficient dentist with an up to date technical set up.He works quite fast to resolve the issue one has.In nutshell,simply superb experience!Would recommend strongly.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I had an amazing painless experience with Dr Pahwa. I went for dental fillings and he did the job effortlessly.

review: ****** ** **** **** *** ************** Hygiene is maintained well in the clinic. All COVID19 precautions are taken. Disposable instruments are used for treatment. Overall a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for the tooth decay problem and was scared of my previous experience with other dentist. But came out with overall satisfaction with best medical attention and care. Strongly recommend Dr. Navin Pahwa for all your dental issues.
